page.title: 16A day in the life (aged 9)
page.content: On Sunday mornings my mum comes into my bedroom and wakes me up. I go downstairs, have a drink of tea and get washed and dressed. For breakfast I have 'Cocopops'. After that we go to Sunday school. At Sunday school we sing songs about God, then go into classes and talk about God. After that we go home. When I get home I clean the rabbit out. He is called Soot. When I have finished I play out. We play cartwheels and handstands. I play out until my dinner is ready. When my dinner's ready I eat it then I have my pudding, usually rice pudding. Then I play out till 6 o'clock. At 6 o'clock I go in for my tea. We often have sausages, beans and chips. Then I get washed, come down for my bedtime drink and then I go to bed at 8 o'clock.
